title: Soviet troops 'turned to stone' by angry aliens after shooting down UFO
description: Declassified CIA file details claims from Ukrainian newspaper that soldiers fired missile at craft in Siberia, only to be petrified by its vengeful occupants

title: Declassified CIA files detail Soviet UFO encounter that 'turned 23 soldiers to stone'
description: Report from 1993 claimed Russian troops shot down an alien spacecraft in Siberia, but were soon made to regret it

title: Soviet troops 'turned to stone by aliens' after shooting down UFO
description: Report claims Russian troops fired a missile at the object in Siberia, but soon regretted it

title: Soviets investigated ‘jellyfish’ UFO above Russian city
description: A bizarre “jellyfish” UFO crowned with shifting coloured lights reportedly hovered over a Russian city for more than an hour.

title: Close encounter with aliens and 'jellyfish' UFO turned soldiers into stone
description: This is just one of many stories found amongst Soviet-era files that have been recently released to the public.
